column4: I'm trying to do a regex search and replace using sed. However, it only checks it line by line is there a way to avoid that? I'm looking for a pattern spread over multiple lines
regex on more than one line are a no go with unix tools. many if not all work on line by line basis
thanks I'll have to make a more complicated parser than
looks like maybe perl could do it http://www.perlmonks.org/?node_id=17947
